uniques.name: Card - Screen Border
uniques: Comment [Yukari Yakumo's ability to let you freely warp between map edges for Scout. It will activates when you have this card.]
May Paradrop up to [100] tiles from inside friendly territory <if it hasn't used other actions yet> <for [Scout] units>
[This Unit] loses the [Card - Screen Border] promotion <upon turn end> <without [Ability Card; Screen Border]>

uniques.name: Card - Great Tengu's Barley Rice

civilopediaText.text: Ability Card; Great Tengu's Barley Rice
civilopediaText.link: Resources/Ability Card; Great Tengu's Barley Rice

uniques: Comment [Megumu Iizunamaru's ability that gives move points for just bought units when you have this card, allowing them to enter [Mountain] tiles with +1 Movement. Why are you collecting Power after setting foot on the mountain? You should pack tons of food to begin with, and then set out.]
Can move immediately once bought <for [All] units>
[This Unit] loses the [Card - Great Tengu's Barley Rice] promotion <upon turn end> <without [Ability Card; Great Tengu's Barley Rice]>

uniques.name: Card - Ice Fairy
uniques: Comment [Ice fairies are useful when unit in cold regions. Gives little Defence bonus in Cold Regions, And Can enter ice tiles for navy and embarking units when you have Ice Fairy Card.]
Can enter ice tiles <with [Ice Fairy Card]>

uniques.name: Card - Smelt's Scales
uniques: Comment [All units will be able to attack while embarked when you have Smelt's Scales Card.]
[This Unit] loses the [Card - Smelt's Scales] promotion <upon turn end> <without [Ability Card; Smelt's Scales]>

uniques.name: Card - Pebble Hat
uniques: Comment [Koishi Komeiji's ability to prevent your enemies from seeing your Scouts, unless nearby.]
[This Unit] loses the [Card - Pebble Hat] promotion <upon turn end> <without [Ability Card; Pebble Hat]>

uniques.name: Card - Beauty Of Destruction
uniques: Comment [Flan's ability to destroy Improved tiles with your Siege Unit when you have Beauty of Destruction Card. There are many Fortress in enemy territory? What a dumb is it. Why don't they know at it can be destroyed easily?]
Destroys tile improvements when attacking <for [Siege] units> <when at war>
[This Unit] loses the [Card - Beauty Of Destruction] promotion <upon turn end> <without [Ability Card; Beauty Of Destruction]>
